attributes.action: Force BBC Televisions Top Gear Presenters to put the Ultima GTR around their test track.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Ultima GTR is a British made car.  For some reason Top Gear consistently ignore the Ultima GTR despite the factory, in desperation - independantly running a much faster time on the Top Gear test track.  As a BBC program, Top Gear should be supporting the British Car Industry.  They should be actively promoting British made cars.  There have been many requests for them to feature this car, but so far they have fallen on deaf ears.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
